welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ishioka, Japan! This charming city is known for its beautiful cherry blossoms and historic temples. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Ishioka has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ibaraki Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ibaraki Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Narita International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a wide range of amenities, serving primarily international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Narita International Airport, dedicated to low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.
